doc.title: Panorama of Tivoli, Italy, Showing Seven Falls
doc.plot: One of the most picturesque and oldest towns in Italy. Shows the town, which is situated on a high hill covered with olive trees, and a fine view of the Seven Falls. (Taken on the winter cruise of the S. S. "Auguste Victoria" of the Hamburg-American Line, leaving New York on 03 Feb 1903.)
